title: TEEMO AND MY 20 MINUTES
body:
RITO, could you delete Teemo and my 20 minutes ban. I got it when i was playing DOOM BOTS and my computer charger turned off and my PC turn off too, so i want to play your fantastic game dear RITO.



Pls watch my pleasure or drink some cold Cola. The best way is doing this two things at one moment :D

replies.body:
Sorry, but we're not able to remove or modify any leaverbuster penalties on accounts for any reason. Regardless of your intent, a disconnection negatively affects everyone in the match. This is a big reason why disconnections are all treated equally by the system.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
